data.text: Avo, mzimbuli zose, nowayalalila kamba kupula, kutambika, kuwatambikila wanhu wayagwe, na kulava hewela vitendeke sama ya wanhu wose,
sama ya wandewa, na waja wose wali na udaho, giladi tukale mditindiwalo na bila kugomba mkumnogela Mulungu na ung'azi.
Nhambiko kamba ino inoga, na imnogeza Mulungu Mkombola wetu,
ayo yolonda wanhu wose wakomboligwe na wapate kuitanga ikweli.
Kwavija hana Mulungu imwe, na hana imwe yodaha kuwalumba wanhu wose hamoja na Mulungu, nayo iyo Kilisto Yesu,
ayo yaulavile ugima wake giladi yawakombole wanhu wose. Mbuli ino ilavigwa usindila mkipigiti kilondigwe.
Kino kicho kilamso cha Kilisto kunisagula nie kuwa mtumigwa wake giladi niupete Usenga Unogile na kuifundiza nhamanila ya ikweli ha Wamhazi. Sivwiza, ila nolonga ikweli.
Hanhu hohose hawaiting'hane wanhu wamtogole Kilisto nolonda wambigalo watambike, wambigalo wekigwe mmakono ga Mulungu wadahe kwinula makono gao mkutambika bila lusango ama kuibamilila.
Vivija nolonda watwanzi wavale vinogile na kwa hishima, wavale vivalo vilondigwa kuvaligwa na watwanzi, sio mkukutika mvili za hela bwando ama kuvala zahabu ama lulu ama vivalo va hela bwando
ila na sang'hano zinogile, kamba viilondeka na watwanzi watogole kumtambikila Mulungu.
Mtwanzi kolondigwa yaifundize kunyamala na kuwa na moyo wa kuihumulusa.
Simtogoza mtwanzi kufundiza ama kuwa na udaho kwa mbigalo. Mtwanzi kolondigwa yanyamale.
Kwavija Adamu iyo yasongile kuumbigwa, abaho Hawa.
Adamu sio iyo yavwiziligwe. Ila mtwanzi iyo yavwiziligwe na kugaluka munhu yali na vilozo.
Ila Mulungu kowakombola watwanzi kulawa m'vilozo vao kubitila kulela wana, ihawa wogendelela kukala mnhamanila, mdinoge, muung'azi, hamoja na kuleka kuigoda.
